fields.summary: When hive.server2.async.exec.async.compile is turned on, from JDBC we will get "The query did not generate a result set"

comments.body: Patch-1: add hasResultSet field in OperationStatus so when the query finishes, we will get accurate hasResultSet.
+[~jxiang] Notice that you enabled compile inside the session.

[~aihuaxu], yeah, I was thinking to file a followup issue. Thanks a lot for the patch. Can we also add a test to make sure jdbc works when hive.driver.parallel.compilation=false and  hive.server2.async.exec.async.compile=true?
Patch-2: address comments.
Thanks. +1

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12806836/HIVE-13882.2.patch

ATTACHMENT ID: 12806836 - PreCommit-HIVE-MASTER-Build
Pushed to master. Thanks Jimmy for reviewing.
Do we want this in branch-2.1 ? cc: [~vgumashta]
Yeah. We should include this in branch-2.1 as well.

[~jcamachorodriguez] Jesus, if it's not too late, can we commit this to 2.1? I wouldn't call it a release blocker though, since the config that enables aync compilation is turned off by default for now.
Sure, go ahead; we have a blocker that we are trying to get fixed, so in the meantime it is OK to push to branch-2.1. Thanks
Committed to 2.1.0 branch.

Doc note:  This changes the description of *hive.driver.parallel.compilation*, which was introduced by HIVE-4239 in 2.0.0.  It needs to be documented in the HiveServer2 section of Configuration Properties.

* [Configuration Properties -- HiveServer2 | https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/Hive/Configuration+Properties#ConfigurationProperties-HiveServer2]

Added a TODOC2.1 label.

Edit 06/Jul/17:  Now it's a TODOC2.2 label.  The patch was reverted from branch-2.1 in June 2016.
this broke the build under itests/ in both 2.1 and 2.2
I'll revert it from 2.1 since it's due to release soon. [~aihuaxu] Looks like there is a build issue on master that [~ekoifman] is pointing to. Thanks.
Reverted from 2.1. Will commit again once itest build issue is fixed.
[~ekoifman] Just tried. The master branch with the patch builds fine locally for me under itests/. Let me resync to see if something else broke it.
[~ekoifman] I don't see any build error under /hive and /hive/itests on the latest master. What kind of errors do you see? Can you retry on the master?

you are right, the issue was only in branch-2.1.  There is not getConnection() method (with no args) in TestJdbcWithMiniHS2.
master is ok.  Sorry for the confusion.
Thanks for confirming. I will resolve it now then.
[~aihuaxu], please set the fix version.
[~aihuaxu] Should this be committed to branch-2.1 so that it's available in 2.1 maintenance release in future? I can commit it back. Thanks.
[~vgumashta] Yes. Please commit to branch-2.1 as well. Since hive.server2.async.exec.async.compile is default to false, so I didn't put to 2.1, but please do. Thanks.
It seems that this fix hasn't been commited back to 2.1
